ufc-323-dvalishvili-vs-yan-2-2025-12-07.text:
# MERAB DVALISHVILI VS PETR YAN

**CONTEXT:**
Merab's on a tear and wants gold. Yan's the former champ looking to reclaim his throne.

**MERAB DVALISHVILI'S PATH TO VICTORY:**
• Wrestle Yan into oblivion for five rounds straight
• Gas tank built different—outlast the legend's cardio
• Ground control keeps Yan's hands too busy to counter

**PETR YAN'S PATH TO VICTORY:**
• Precision striking and footwork to avoid the takedown grind
• Body shots break Merab's pace and slow his wrestling urgency
• Clinch dominance to neutralize grappling exchanges

**THE MATCHUP:**
Merab's a relentless wrestling machine who'll suffocate you with pressure—Yan needs to keep this standing or get caught in endless scrambles. Watch if Petr's technique can stuff the takedowns early; if Merab gets rolling, it's over. This is peak UFC: raw wrestling dominance versus surgical striking mastery.
